name: Michael Jordan
description: 6'6", 216 lbs. Bald head, piercing eyes, intense competitor. The greatest basketball player of all time.

tongue-out-dunk.name: Tongue Out Dunk
tongue-out-dunk.description: MJ soaring for a dunk, tongue wagging, legs spread wide.
tongue-out-dunk.prompt: Michael Jordan driving to the basket, airborne, tongue sticking out, slamming the ball with one hand, legs spread for balance, eyes locked on the rim, aggressive and powerful.

the-shrug.name: The Shrug
the-shrug.description: Jordan shrugging after hitting multiple 3s in the 1992 NBA Finals.
the-shrug.prompt: Michael Jordan standing on the court, shoulders raised, palms up, looking at the bench with a slight grin, as if to say 'I don't know how I did that.' The shrug pose after hitting a difficult shot.

the-last-shot.name: The Last Shot
the-last-shot.description: Jordan's game-winning shot over Bryon Russell in the 1998 NBA Finals.
the-last-shot.prompt: Michael Jordan rising up for a jump shot over Bryon Russell, holding his follow-through, eyes locked on the basket, body leaning slightly back, intense focus on his face, iconic last shot moment, Chicago Bulls uniform.

championship-fist-pump.name: Championship Fist Pump
championship-fist-pump.description: MJ celebrating a championship victory with a powerful fist pump.
championship-fist-pump.prompt: Michael Jordan clenching his fist, pumping his arm in the air, screaming with joy, celebrating a championship victory, sweat dripping from his brow, pure exhilaration and accomplishment on his face, Bulls uniform, confetti falling.

fadeaway-jumper.name: Fadeaway Jumper
fadeaway-jumper.description: Jordan executing his signature fadeaway jumper.
fadeaway-jumper.prompt: Michael Jordan fading away while shooting a jump shot, body leaning back, legs spread for balance, ball leaving his fingertips with perfect arc, defender unable to contest, composed expression, signature fadeaway move.

rivalry-freeze-out-scene.name: Rivalry: Freeze Out Scene
rivalry-freeze-out-scene.description: Michael Jordan in rivalry scene: Mid-1980s All-Star game in a brightly lit arena; a flurry of movement and color surrounds them.
rivalry-freeze-out-scene.prompt: Michael Jordan, in his All-Star uniform, looks frustrated and isolated on the perimeter, his hand extended, calling for the ball but ignored. His expression is a mix of confusion and determination.

rivalry-jordan-rules-scene.name: Rivalry: Jordan Rules Scene
rivalry-jordan-rules-scene.description: Michael Jordan in rivalry scene: A tense, packed arena during the Eastern Conference Finals; the atmosphere is charged with anticipation and aggression.
rivalry-jordan-rules-scene.prompt: Michael Jordan drives aggressively to the basket, contorting his body to avoid a hard foul. His face is strained with effort and determination, eyes focused on the rim.

rivalry-walk-off-scene.name: Rivalry: Walk Off Scene
rivalry-walk-off-scene.description: Michael Jordan in rivalry scene: The final moments of the 1991 Eastern Conference Finals; confetti rains down as the Bulls celebrate, while the Pistons exit in disgrace.
rivalry-walk-off-scene.prompt: Michael Jordan, victorious, stands on the court, fist clenched, a triumphant expression on his face. He watches the retreating Pistons with a mixture of satisfaction and disdain.

rivalry-dream-team-snub-scene.name: Rivalry: Dream Team Snub Scene
rivalry-dream-team-snub-scene.description: Michael Jordan in rivalry scene: Split scene; one side depicts the euphoria of the Olympic games, the other depicts the isolation of being left behind.
rivalry-dream-team-snub-scene.prompt: Michael Jordan, wearing a USA jersey, stands tall and confident during the 1992 Olympic games, a gold medal gleaming around his neck. He looks composed and focused, ready to lead.
